abstract: The activist investor Carl Icahn may go hostile in his efforts to push the oil refiner CVR Energy into a sale, preparing a $2.6 billion offer in the hopes of stirring up another bid for the company.

lead_paragraph: The activist investor Carl C. Icahn has put CVR Energy on notice.

headline.main: Icahn to Bid $2.6 Billion for CVR

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
